selected_quotes: Cracks show in the #FeesMustFall movement as question of gender, and the equality of LGBTIQA+ individuals are raised
There is a toxic alliance in post-colonial societies between extreme forms of capitalism and nationalist #patriarchy
Andile #Mngxitama has a position on the #rape of black women that appears to be deeply complicit with colonial ideas
Student movement splinters over equality of women and the rights of LGBTIQA+ people @UCT_Crim
@beementile Least of all the same woman who wrote this on the authority of charismatic men. Shook, disappointed, unsurprised.

citation.abstract: A violent attack on a female student at one of South Africa's prominent universities was not an isolated incident. It told a universal tale of how patriarchy still rules.
